description: The file implements socket communication functions for interacting with the Open vSwitch Database (OVSDB) over a Unix domain socket. It includes functions for connecting, disconnecting, reading, writing, and setting socket modes, along with utility functions.

methods.name: bool msecs_to_timeval(int msecs,struct timeval * tv)
methods.description: Converts milliseconds to a timeval structure for use with select().

methods.name: int ovsdb_socket_disconnect(int fd)
methods.description: Closes the socket file descriptor, with logging and error handling.

methods.name: int ovsdb_socket_set_mode(int fd,int flag)
methods.description: Sets the socket's file descriptor to non-blocking mode or other flags.

methods.name: int ovsdb_socket_connect()
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the OVSDB socket, sets it to non-blocking mode.

methods.name: ssize_t ovsdb_socket_write(int fd,const char * buffer,size_t len)
ssize_t ovsdb_socket_listen(int fd,char * buffer,size_t size,int timeout)
methods.description: Checks for incoming data on the socket within a specified timeout, reads data if available.

ctags.name: msecs_to_timeval
ctags.pattern: /^static bool msecs_to_timeval(int msecs, struct timeval* tv)$/

ctags.name: ovsdb_socket_listen
ctags.pattern: /^ssize_t ovsdb_socket_listen(int fd, char * buffer, size_t size, int timeout)$/

ctags.name: ovsdb_socket_write
ctags.pattern: /^ssize_t ovsdb_socket_write(int fd, const char *buffer, size_t len)$/
